primary_mission: Execute core implementation tasks and fixes from the master task sequence in proper order
execution_requirements: Implement critical fixes and refactoring requirements
Ensure all core functionality is working
Report progress after each task completion
Continue to next task immediately after success criteria met
task_validation: Quality gates pass after each task
output_format: Progress reports after each task with quality gate validation results and detailed explanations
success_criteria: All tasks completed in sequence with quality gates passing and no regressions
